assessment_template_create_payload.title: Technology Alignment Assessment
assessment_template_create_payload.description: This 27-point assessment evaluates client technology alignment across six core service areas, designed to help MSPs understand current state, identify opportunities, and align services with business objectives. Each item includes tiered scoring and is framed in business terms to support both customer acquisition and existing relationship optimization.

categories.title: Foundation Services
categories.description: Core IT infrastructure and support services that form the backbone of reliable business operations. These foundational elements enable day-to-day productivity and establish the groundwork for advanced technology initiatives.

questions.title: Help Desk & End-User Support
questions.description: Comprehensive user support including self-service portals, 24×7 service desk, remote assistance, on-site dispatch, and VIP executive support services.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement tiered support structure with self-service options, establish SLAs for response times, and consider VIP support for executives. Focus on proactive communication and user experience.

criteria.description: Basic or ad-hoc support only, no structured help desk services
Standard help desk during business hours with basic ticketing
24×7 support with self-service portal and remote assistance capabilities
Comprehensive support ecosystem with VIP services, proactive monitoring, and user satisfaction tracking

questions.scoring_instructions: Evaluate the maturity and comprehensiveness of end-user support services. Consider availability, response times, escalation procedures, and user satisfaction.

questions.title: Device & Endpoint Management
questions.description: Complete lifecycle management of all endpoints including asset tracking, configuration management, patch management, encryption, mobile device management, and warranty tracking.
questions.remediation_tips: Deploy unified endpoint management (UEM) platform, implement automated patching, ensure encryption compliance, and establish asset lifecycle processes.

criteria.description: Manual device management with limited visibility and control
Basic asset inventory and manual patching processes
Automated patching, encryption management, and MDM for mobile devices
Comprehensive UEM with automated lifecycle management, compliance reporting, and predictive maintenance

questions.scoring_instructions: Assess the comprehensiveness of endpoint management including asset visibility, security posture, compliance, and automation levels.

questions.title: Network Infrastructure
questions.description: Robust network infrastructure including wired and wireless connectivity, network security, monitoring, and optimization for performance and reliability.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement network monitoring and management tools, ensure redundancy and failover capabilities, and establish network security best practices.

criteria.description: Basic network infrastructure with limited monitoring and security
Standard network with basic monitoring and security measures
Advanced network with comprehensive monitoring, security, and optimization
Optimized network infrastructure with predictive maintenance and advanced security

questions.scoring_instructions: Evaluate network infrastructure maturity, security posture, monitoring capabilities, and performance optimization.

questions.title: Data Backup & Recovery
questions.description: Comprehensive data protection including backup strategies, disaster recovery planning, and business continuity solutions.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement 3-2-1 backup strategy, test recovery procedures regularly, and establish disaster recovery plans with clear RTO/RPO objectives.

criteria.description: Basic backup with limited testing and no disaster recovery plan
Standard backup with periodic testing and basic disaster recovery
Comprehensive backup and recovery with regular testing and documented procedures
Advanced backup and recovery with automated testing and business continuity integration

questions.scoring_instructions: Assess backup strategy comprehensiveness, testing frequency, disaster recovery planning, and business continuity readiness.

questions.title: Security & Compliance
questions.description: Comprehensive security measures including endpoint protection, access controls, monitoring, and compliance management.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement layered security approach, establish access controls and monitoring, and ensure compliance with relevant regulations.

criteria.description: Basic security measures with limited compliance oversight
Standard security with basic compliance management
Comprehensive security with active monitoring and compliance management
Advanced security with proactive threat detection and automated compliance

questions.scoring_instructions: Evaluate security posture, compliance status, monitoring capabilities, and incident response readiness.

questions.title: Cloud Services
questions.description: Cloud infrastructure and services including migration, management, optimization, and cost control.
questions.remediation_tips: Develop cloud strategy, implement cost management tools, and establish governance and security controls for cloud services.

criteria.description: Limited cloud adoption with no formal strategy or management
Basic cloud services with limited optimization and cost control
Comprehensive cloud services with optimization and cost management
Advanced cloud strategy with automation, optimization, and governance

questions.scoring_instructions: Assess cloud adoption level, strategy maturity, cost management, and governance practices.

categories.title: Business Applications
categories.description: Critical business applications and software solutions that drive productivity, collaboration, and operational efficiency.

questions.title: Email & Collaboration
questions.description: Email systems, collaboration tools, and communication platforms that enable effective team work and communication.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement modern collaboration platforms, ensure email security and compliance, and provide training on effective collaboration tools.

criteria.description: Basic email with limited collaboration tools
Standard email and collaboration with basic security
Advanced collaboration platform with security and compliance
Optimized collaboration ecosystem with advanced features and automation

questions.scoring_instructions: Evaluate email system maturity, collaboration tool effectiveness, security measures, and user adoption.

questions.title: Business Intelligence & Analytics
questions.description: Data analytics, reporting, and business intelligence tools that provide insights for decision-making.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement data analytics platforms, establish data governance, and provide training on data-driven decision making.

criteria.description: Limited analytics capabilities with manual reporting processes
Basic analytics with standard reporting tools
Comprehensive analytics with automated reporting and dashboards
Advanced analytics with predictive capabilities and real-time insights

questions.scoring_instructions: Assess analytics capabilities, reporting automation, data quality, and insight generation.

questions.title: Customer Relationship Management
questions.description: CRM systems and customer management tools that support sales, marketing, and customer service operations.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement integrated CRM solution, ensure data quality and user adoption, and integrate with other business systems.

criteria.description: Basic customer tracking with limited CRM functionality
Standard CRM with basic sales and marketing features
Comprehensive CRM with advanced features and integration
Advanced CRM with automation, analytics, and customer journey optimization

questions.scoring_instructions: Evaluate CRM system maturity, feature utilization, data quality, and integration with other systems.

questions.title: Enterprise Resource Planning
questions.description: ERP systems and business management software that integrate core business processes.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement ERP solution that integrates key business processes, ensure data consistency, and provide comprehensive user training.

criteria.description: Disconnected business systems with manual processes
Basic ERP with limited integration and automation
Comprehensive ERP with good integration and process automation
Advanced ERP with full integration, automation, and real-time insights

questions.scoring_instructions: Assess ERP system maturity, process integration, automation levels, and data consistency.

questions.title: Industry-Specific Applications
questions.description: Specialized software and applications tailored to specific industry requirements and compliance needs.
questions.remediation_tips: Evaluate industry-specific software needs, ensure compliance with industry regulations, and integrate with core business systems.

criteria.description: Limited industry-specific software with compliance gaps
Basic industry software with standard compliance measures
Comprehensive industry software with good compliance and integration
Advanced industry software with full compliance and optimization

questions.scoring_instructions: Evaluate industry software effectiveness, compliance status, integration with core systems, and optimization.

categories.title: Advanced Technologies
categories.description: Emerging and advanced technologies that provide competitive advantages and operational efficiencies.

questions.title: Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
questions.description: AI/ML solutions that automate processes, provide insights, and enhance decision-making capabilities.
questions.remediation_tips: Identify AI/ML opportunities, implement pilot projects, and ensure data quality and governance for AI initiatives.

criteria.description: No AI/ML implementation with limited understanding of potential
Basic AI/ML with limited scope and impact
Comprehensive AI/ML implementation with measurable benefits
Advanced AI/ML with strategic integration and competitive advantage

questions.scoring_instructions: Assess AI/ML adoption level, implementation scope, business impact, and strategic alignment.

questions.title: Internet of Things (IoT)
questions.description: IoT devices and platforms that enable data collection, monitoring, and automation across business operations.
questions.remediation_tips: Develop IoT strategy, implement security measures, and ensure data management and integration capabilities.

criteria.description: No IoT implementation with limited understanding of potential
Basic IoT with limited scope and security
Comprehensive IoT with good security and data management
Advanced IoT with strategic integration and automation

questions.scoring_instructions: Evaluate IoT adoption, security measures, data management, and business value generation.

questions.title: Robotic Process Automation
questions.description: RPA solutions that automate repetitive tasks and improve operational efficiency.
questions.remediation_tips: Identify automation opportunities, implement RPA solutions, and ensure proper governance and monitoring.

criteria.description: No RPA implementation with manual processes
Basic RPA with limited scope and impact
Comprehensive RPA with measurable efficiency gains
Advanced RPA with strategic automation and optimization

questions.scoring_instructions: Assess RPA adoption, automation scope, efficiency gains, and strategic alignment.

questions.title: Blockchain & Distributed Ledger
questions.description: Blockchain solutions for secure transactions, smart contracts, and decentralized applications.
questions.remediation_tips: Evaluate blockchain opportunities, implement pilot projects, and ensure security and compliance measures.

criteria.description: No blockchain implementation with limited understanding
Basic blockchain with limited scope and impact
Comprehensive blockchain with good security and compliance
Advanced blockchain with strategic integration and innovation

questions.scoring_instructions: Evaluate blockchain adoption, implementation scope, security measures, and business value.

categories.title: Strategic Planning
categories.description: Technology strategy, planning, and governance that align IT initiatives with business objectives.

questions.title: Technology Strategy & Roadmap
questions.description: Comprehensive technology strategy and roadmap that aligns IT initiatives with business goals and objectives.
questions.remediation_tips: Develop comprehensive technology strategy, create detailed roadmap, and ensure alignment with business objectives.

criteria.description: No formal technology strategy or roadmap
Basic technology strategy with limited roadmap
Comprehensive technology strategy with detailed roadmap
Advanced technology strategy with agile roadmap and continuous optimization

questions.scoring_instructions: Assess technology strategy comprehensiveness, roadmap detail, business alignment, and execution planning.

questions.title: IT Governance & Risk Management
questions.description: IT governance framework and risk management processes that ensure effective technology oversight and control.
questions.remediation_tips: Establish IT governance framework, implement risk management processes, and ensure compliance and oversight.

criteria.description: Limited IT governance with poor risk management
Basic IT governance with standard risk management
Comprehensive IT governance with good risk management
Advanced IT governance with proactive risk management and optimization

questions.scoring_instructions: Evaluate IT governance maturity, risk management effectiveness, compliance status, and oversight capabilities.

questions.title: Technology Investment & ROI
questions.description: Technology investment strategy and ROI measurement that ensures optimal resource allocation and value delivery.
questions.remediation_tips: Develop technology investment strategy, implement ROI measurement, and ensure value delivery and optimization.

criteria.description: Poor technology investment strategy with limited ROI measurement
Basic investment strategy with standard ROI measurement
Comprehensive investment strategy with good ROI measurement
Advanced investment strategy with predictive ROI and optimization

questions.scoring_instructions: Assess investment strategy effectiveness, ROI measurement accuracy, value delivery, and optimization practices.

questions.title: Digital Transformation Readiness
questions.description: Organizational readiness for digital transformation initiatives and change management capabilities.
questions.remediation_tips: Assess digital transformation readiness, develop change management capabilities, and ensure organizational alignment.

criteria.description: Poor digital transformation readiness with limited change management
Basic readiness with standard change management
Good readiness with comprehensive change management
Advanced readiness with proactive change management and optimization

questions.scoring_instructions: Evaluate digital transformation readiness, change management effectiveness, organizational alignment, and execution capabilities.

categories.title: Operational Excellence
categories.description: IT operations, service management, and continuous improvement processes that ensure reliable and efficient technology delivery.

questions.title: IT Service Management
questions.description: ITSM processes and tools that ensure effective service delivery, incident management, and continuous improvement.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement ITSM framework, establish service management processes, and ensure continuous improvement and optimization.

criteria.description: Poor ITSM with limited processes and tools
Basic ITSM with standard processes and tools
Comprehensive ITSM with good processes and tools
Advanced ITSM with optimized processes and automation

questions.scoring_instructions: Assess ITSM maturity, process effectiveness, tool utilization, and continuous improvement practices.

questions.title: Performance Monitoring & Optimization
questions.description: Comprehensive monitoring and optimization of technology systems, applications, and infrastructure performance.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement comprehensive monitoring, establish performance baselines, and ensure proactive optimization and improvement.

criteria.description: Limited monitoring with reactive performance management
Basic monitoring with standard performance management
Comprehensive monitoring with proactive performance management
Advanced monitoring with predictive optimization and automation

questions.scoring_instructions: Evaluate monitoring comprehensiveness, performance management effectiveness, optimization practices, and automation levels.

questions.title: Capacity Planning & Scalability
questions.description: Capacity planning processes and scalability strategies that ensure technology systems can meet current and future demands.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement capacity planning processes, develop scalability strategies, and ensure proactive resource management.

criteria.description: Poor capacity planning with limited scalability
Basic capacity planning with standard scalability
Comprehensive capacity planning with good scalability
Advanced capacity planning with predictive scalability and optimization

questions.scoring_instructions: Assess capacity planning effectiveness, scalability strategies, resource management, and future readiness.

questions.title: Quality Assurance & Testing
questions.description: Quality assurance processes and testing methodologies that ensure reliable and high-quality technology delivery.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement quality assurance processes, establish testing methodologies, and ensure continuous improvement and optimization.

criteria.description: Poor quality assurance with limited testing processes
Basic quality assurance with standard testing processes
Comprehensive quality assurance with good testing processes
Advanced quality assurance with automated testing and optimization

questions.scoring_instructions: Evaluate quality assurance effectiveness, testing methodologies, defect management, and continuous improvement practices.

categories.title: Innovation & Future Readiness
categories.description: Innovation capabilities, emerging technology adoption, and future readiness that position the organization for long-term success.

questions.title: Innovation Culture & Processes
questions.description: Organizational culture and processes that foster innovation, experimentation, and creative problem-solving.
questions.remediation_tips: Foster innovation culture, establish innovation processes, and ensure support for experimentation and creative problem-solving.

criteria.description: Poor innovation culture with limited experimentation
Basic innovation culture with standard processes
Good innovation culture with comprehensive processes
Advanced innovation culture with optimized processes and automation

questions.scoring_instructions: Assess innovation culture strength, process effectiveness, experimentation support, and creative problem-solving capabilities.

questions.title: Emerging Technology Evaluation
questions.description: Processes and capabilities for evaluating, piloting, and adopting emerging technologies that provide competitive advantages.
questions.remediation_tips: Establish emerging technology evaluation processes, implement pilot programs, and ensure strategic adoption and integration.

criteria.description: Poor emerging technology evaluation with limited adoption
Basic evaluation with standard adoption processes
Comprehensive evaluation with good adoption processes
Advanced evaluation with strategic adoption and optimization

questions.scoring_instructions: Evaluate emerging technology evaluation processes, pilot program effectiveness, adoption strategies, and competitive advantage generation.

questions.title: Technology Talent & Skills
questions.description: Technology talent acquisition, development, and retention strategies that ensure access to required skills and capabilities.
questions.remediation_tips: Develop technology talent strategy, implement skills development programs, and ensure talent retention and optimization.

criteria.description: Poor technology talent with limited skills development
Basic talent strategy with standard skills development
Comprehensive talent strategy with good skills development
Advanced talent strategy with optimized skills development and retention

questions.scoring_instructions: Assess technology talent strategy, skills development effectiveness, retention practices, and capability optimization.

questions.title: Future Technology Vision
questions.description: Long-term technology vision and strategic planning that positions the organization for future success and competitive advantage.
questions.remediation_tips: Develop future technology vision, create strategic planning processes, and ensure alignment with business objectives and market trends.

criteria.description: Poor future vision with limited strategic planning
Basic future vision with standard strategic planning
Comprehensive future vision with good strategic planning
Advanced future vision with optimized strategic planning and execution

questions.scoring_instructions: Evaluate future technology vision clarity, strategic planning effectiveness, market alignment, and competitive positioning.
